articles.description: With Applause, Diane Warren has been nominated for the Oscar for the 14th time and this is her sixth nomination in a row.
articles.content: ON the streets of Mumbai, outside a chai tapri, actors Jacqueline Fernandez and Anjali Lama dance to the song Applause, written by legendary Diane Warren and sung by Sofia Carson, in the rain. This s… [+4785 chars]
